html: #Putin is not our friend nor merely a competitor. Putin is our enemy—not b/c we wish it so, but b/c he has chosen to be. He chose to invade Ukraine & annex Crimea. He chose to help Assad slaughter Syrians. He chose to attack our election & undermine democracies around the world.
text: #Putin is not our friend nor merely a competitor. Putin is our enemy—not b/c we wish it so, but b/c he has chosen to be. He chose to invade Ukraine & annex Crimea. He chose to help Assad slaughter Syrians. He chose to attack our election & undermine democracies around the world.

html: As all eyes turn to #Helsinki, @POTUS must reverse his disturbing tendency to show America’s adversaries the deference & esteem that should be reserved for our allies. He must be strong with #Putin & show willingness to defend the US & our allies against those who threaten us.
text: As all eyes turn to #Helsinki, @POTUS must reverse his disturbing tendency to show America’s adversaries the deference & esteem that should be reserved for our allies. He must be strong with #Putin & show willingness to defend the US & our allies against those who threaten us.

html: Every year, our committee reports out a bill that is debated, amended & signed into law—imperfect, full of compromises, unsatisfactory for partisans on either side, but always striving to make incremental progress on solving problems & defending America her from her adversaries.

html: Thanks to my #SASC colleagues’ commitment to principled legislating, I believe the NDAA will continue to serve as an example of how the Senate can and should work.
text: Thanks to my #SASC colleagues’ commitment to principled legislating, I believe the NDAA will continue to serve as an example of how the Senate can and should work.

html: My term as #SASC Chairman has been far from perfect. But I'm proud our members have upheld the Senate’s finest traditions, embraced regular order, worked within our peculiar rules and customs, and accepted the necessity of compromise.
text: My term as #SASC Chairman has been far from perfect. But I'm proud our members have upheld the Senate’s finest traditions, embraced regular order, worked within our peculiar rules and customs, and accepted the necessity of compromise.

html: I’d also like to express my thanks to @JimInhofe for shepherding the #FY19NDAA through the committee markup in my absence this year. I am grateful for his leadership in presiding over committee hearings as well.

html: Our work is far from over. While we have a budget deal, we owe our troops a commitment not to slide back into dysfunction, not to hold their resources hostage to unrelated political concerns & never to send them into harm’s way without everything they need to be successful.
text: Our work is far from over. While we have a budget deal, we owe our troops a commitment not to slide back into dysfunction, not to hold their resources hostage to unrelated political concerns & never to send them into harm’s way without everything they need to be successful.
